name: baldis basics education& learn
description: In baldy grany in school 3D game you need to collect all the laptops, solve the problems correctly and run away from school. Can you do it? After all, on the way you are waiting for more and horror characters who live in the school. Perhaps they will be even a little more frightening than a cleaning lady. For every wrong answer, an angry Baldy can arrange a horror for you and if he finds you, then there will be no turning back. To survive you need to know all the basics of Baldy
